EnemyController
MonoBehaviour
public
EnemyController

Controls the behavior of an enemy in the game.

Variables
isUIElement
public bool isUIElement

Determines if the enemy is a UI element.

health
public float health

The health of the enemy.

animator
public Animator animator

The animator component for controlling animations.

float damage
)

float

The amount of damage to inflict on the enemy.
